channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Kilmar Abrego Garcia is expected to be released from jail only to be taken into immigration custody
item.description: Kilmar Abrego Garcia’s wife says their wedding anniversary falls on the day he’s expected to be released from jail in Tennessee and then taken into immigration custody.

item.title: California official criticized for appearing to call on gangs to intervene in immigration raids
Mississippi is set to execute the state’s longest-serving death row inmate
